ygData.subject: Re: Lost Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: So you blame a single tank? Where was the chanter to mez the mobs? Or the other tank. Usually in my full groups it tends to be the following: Warrior, Ranger
ygData.messageBody:
So you blame a single tank? Where was the chanter
to mez the mobs? Or the other tank. Usually in my
full groups it tends to be the following: Warrior,
Ranger (or another warrior), Rogue or Paladin (possibly
a monk), Cleric, Enchanter, and a Druid (me!). It
is the chanter's job to control extra mobs via
Mez... if the chanter is being attacked, then it falls
to the ranger to taunt it off the chanter (works
well due to a high damage output by the ranger along
with taunt). This strategy tends to work quite well,
and has turned many uncontrollable (normally) trains
into a good bit of fun and experience. And the reason
for the druid? Heals for the cleric/chanter/rogue and
of course Wolf form for
everyone!<br><br>Awooooooo!!!!!<br>Nukai Oakenwulf<br>Wolfing people since level 39!
